articles.author: Sutirtho Patranobis
articles.title: AUKUS: US, Australia and UK submarine pact has Beijing fuming - Hindustan Times
articles.description: In September 2021, the three countries announced the AUKUS, described in yesterday’s joint statement as “…a new security partnership that will promote a free and open Indo-Pacific that is secure and stable”. | World News
articles.content: Beijing: China on Tuesday warned the UK, the US and Australia that they have gone further down a wrong and dangerous road with their nuclear submarines agreement, responding angrily to the pact under… [+3186 chars]
